description: Cody was really looking forward to showing off his new house to Jessie. Not because he thinks it the coolest thing ever, but because he knows it's a total panty dropper.Fortunately for Cody, his theory proved to be true; once again. Jessie loved his house and was immediately interested in seeing what his bedroom looked like. Cody is always willing to give a very detailed tour of his sleeping quarters to eager young women.You're right if you assumed things would heat up between the two once they made it to his ultra comfortable king sized bed. One thing led to another, which led to kissing, undressing, more kissing, sucking, even more kissing, rimming and finally a good fucking.When the show's over, Jessie's stomach and tits are all gooey from Cody's massive orgasm.Now it's time for a tour of the shower, and you know what that means... Enjoy!
title: King size bed for king size fun!
